name: Stop the (Wash) Cycle!
description:
Time to stop the cycle... of doing laundry, 'cause in this game you will be smashing Laundry machines to pieces!

How to Play

Start punching the Laundry machines around you to initiate a combo, keep attacking laundry machine, to prevent the combo meter from disappearing, try to destroy the highest amount of laundry machines, before the combo meter expires!

Controls Mouse & KeyboardControllerActionWASD KeysLeft Analog StickWalk AroudLeft ClickX ButtonAttackLeft ClickA ButtonRoll Credits
  • Game Design and Programming: Giandomenico "James Gmilh" Lombardi
Royalty Free Assets
  • Character Model and Animations: Mixamo.com
  • Foley Sound: gamesounds.xyz
  • Soundtrack: Bensound @gamesounds.xyz
